name: consenting
content:

agreeing to a particular activity by free choice, and considered able to do this, for example because of being old enough or able to think, understand, or communicate clearly: Consenting adults (= people who are considered old enough to agree to something, especially sexual activity) who engage in these sexual acts in private would not be prosecuted. This is a straightforward contract between consenting parties. If they want to dig on the land, and the owner is consenting, they can. consenting intercourse/sex/sexual activity Related word
consent
